name: com.android.systemui.controls.ui.ControlsActivity
description: Displays Device Controls inside an activity. This activity is available to be displayed over the lockscreen if the user has allowed it via [android.provider.Settings.Secure.LOCKSCREEN_SHOW_CONTROLS]. This activity will be destroyed on SCREEN_OFF events, due to issues with occluded activities over lockscreen as well as user expectations for the activity to not continue running.
